concepts.name: Veria
concepts.definition: AI-Native Compliance and Distribution Platform that automates trust and compliance for tokenized real-world assets (Treasuries, MMFs)

concepts.name: TrustLayer
concepts.definition: AI-driven KYC/AML and regulatory validation component within Veria

concepts.name: Compliance Engine
concepts.definition: Dynamic rule synthesis across jurisdictions

concepts.name: Asset Tokenizer
concepts.definition: Converts financial instruments into programmable tokens

concepts.name: Distribution APIs
concepts.definition: Integration layer for broker-dealers, CPAs, and MRKTZR campaigns

concepts.name: AuditGraph
concepts.definition: Immutable compliance ledger for verification and attestation

concepts.name: MRKTZR
concepts.definition: AI Marketing and Partnership Intelligence platform that transforms outreach and business development into an intelligent, autonomous system

concepts.name: Campaign Mesh
concepts.definition: Autonomous agents that execute cross-channel marketing campaigns (email, social, content, PR)

concepts.name: MarketGraph
concepts.definition: Continuously maps industry relationships, product overlaps, and engagement signals

concepts.name: Interactive Outreach Engine
concepts.definition: Generates contextual PRs or Issues in partner repos creating direct, value-first contact in developer ecosystems

concepts.name: Partnership Streamliner
concepts.definition: AI framework to evaluate and design partnerships - compares objectives, scores synergy, generates partnership blueprints

concepts.name: Compliance Bridge
concepts.definition: Ensures all messaging and contracts align with Veria's regulatory and trust frameworks

concepts.name: ROLLIZR
concepts.definition: Industry Rollup & Consolidation Intelligence platform that identifies fragmented industries and uncovers high-value consolidation opportunities

concepts.name: Fragmentation Indexer
concepts.definition: Quantifies how fragmented a given industry is using AI analysis of ownership data, market share, and operational metrics

concepts.name: Opportunity Scanner
concepts.definition: Detects ideal acquisition or partnership targets using MarketGraph data

concepts.name: Synergy Engine
concepts.definition: Analyzes overlap in technology stacks, supply chains, and customer bases to generate a Consolidation Synergy Score

concepts.name: Integration Validator
concepts.definition: Simulates system interoperability (accounting, ERP, CRM) to predict post-merger integration ease

concepts.name: Smart Deal Composer
concepts.definition: Generates AI-assisted M&A or partnership structures with integrated compliance and smart contract support

concepts.name: Fractlzr
concepts.definition: Fractal-Based Secure Encoding - embeds secure information within fractal images using fractal geometry as cryptographic and steganographic medium

concepts.name: Fractal Generator
concepts.definition: Creates multi-layer fractal patterns capable of encoding metadata

concepts.name: AI Decoder
concepts.definition: Reconstructs meaning or data from visual inputs encoded in fractals

concepts.name: CommandCenter
concepts.definition: AI Operating System for Knowledge Work - unified hub for multiple business projects providing centralized monitoring and orchestration

concepts.name: Performia
concepts.definition: AV Platform used for experiential storytelling, education, and creative content layer

relationships.description: MRKTZR handles marketing and distribution for Veria
ROLLIZR identifies acquisitions in regulated verticals
MRKTZR feeds leads and engagement analytics
ROLLIZR uses MarketGraph data for opportunity detection
TrustLayer is a module within Veria
Campaign Mesh is a module within MRKTZR
Fragmentation Indexer is a module within ROLLIZR
